A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is different than any of the other recent installments. It's a thinker\, with multiple plotlines to follow. Although some moments were not my favorite\, they were far outweighed by the things I Loved. It's not a easy watch and you may have to mull it over for a bit. Definitely geared more toward star wars fans instead of the casual movie goer. I loved it!
